trans-unit.source: Number of days until removing files
trans-unit.target: Number of days until removing files

trans-unit.source: Delete entries older than given number of days
trans-unit.target: Delete entries older than given number of days

trans-unit.source: The task could not be added.
trans-unit.target: The task could not be added.

trans-unit.source: The script to execute the Scheduler from the command line is: "%s scheduler".
trans-unit.target: The script to execute the Scheduler from the command line is: "%s scheduler".

trans-unit.source: The webserver user is allowed execute this script.
trans-unit.target: The webserver user is allowed execute this script.

trans-unit.source: The webserver user is not allowed to execute this script.
trans-unit.target: The webserver user is not allowed to execute this script.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

trans-unit.source: The task could not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: The task could not be deleted.

trans-unit.source: The end date is before the start date.
trans-unit.target: The end date is before the start date.

trans-unit.source: Invalid frequency. Please enter either a number of seconds or a valid cron command. The cron parser said: %1$s [code: %2$d].
trans-unit.target: Invalid frequency. Please enter either a number of seconds or a valid cron command. The cron parser said: %1$s [code: %2$d].

trans-unit.source: The information about the last execution of the Scheduler is incomplete.
trans-unit.target: The information about the last execution of the Scheduler is incomplete.

trans-unit.source: This is the list of all available tasks in this TYPO3 installation. Click on the icon at the far right to directly create a new scheduled task of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: This is the list of all available tasks in this TYPO3 installation. Click on the icon at the far right to directly create a new scheduled task of the chosen type.

trans-unit.source: Invalid frequency. Please enter either a number of seconds or a valid cron command.
trans-unit.target: Invalid frequency. Please enter either a number of seconds or a valid cron command.

trans-unit.source: Please enter a sleep time greater or equal to 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: Please enter a sleep time greater or equal to 0 (zero).

trans-unit.source: The Scheduler was last started (%1$s) on %2$s at %3$s and ended on %4$s at %5$s.
trans-unit.target: The Scheduler was last started (%1$s) on %2$s at %3$s and ended on %4$s at %5$s.

trans-unit.source: A running task may not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: A running task may not be deleted.

trans-unit.source: A running task may not be edited.
trans-unit.target: A running task may not be edited.

trans-unit.source: The task is not running. There are no executions to unmark.
trans-unit.target: The task is not running. There are no executions to unmark.

trans-unit.source: No frequency was defined, either as an interval or as a cron command.
trans-unit.target: No frequency was defined, either as an interval or as a cron command.

trans-unit.source: The Scheduler has never yet run or the information about the last run has been lost.
trans-unit.target: The Scheduler has never yet run or the information about the last run has been lost.

trans-unit.source: There are currently no task classes available at all. To be able to create new tasks, you must either enable the samples provided by the Scheduler or install some other extension that relies on the Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: There are currently no task classes available at all. To be able to create new tasks, you must either enable the samples provided by the Scheduler or install some other extension that relies on the Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: The selected task class could not be found. You should probably contact the task's developers.
trans-unit.target: The selected task class could not be found. You should probably contact the task's developers.

trans-unit.source: Execution of task "%1$s" failed with the following message: %2$s
trans-unit.target: Execution of task "%1$s" failed with the following message: %2$s

trans-unit.source: The execution failed, but the error message could not be retrieved (it was probably too large). Sorry.
trans-unit.target: The execution failed, but the error message could not be retrieved (it was probably too large). Sorry.

trans-unit.source: Class %s of the registered task could not be found. You should re-install the extension that provided it or simply delete this task.
trans-unit.target: Class %s of the registered task could not be found. You should re-install the extension that provided it or simply delete this task.

trans-unit.source: The current class (%s) could not be found. Change it below or consider deleting this task altogether.
trans-unit.target: The current class (%s) could not be found. Change it below or consider deleting this task altogether.

trans-unit.source: This screen checks if the requisites for running the Scheduler as a cron job are fulfilled. It also displays information about the last run of the Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: This screen checks if the requisites for running the Scheduler as a cron job are fulfilled. It also displays information about the last run of the Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: The backend user "_cli_scheduler" is used by the CLI-script to log into TYPO3. This user may not have administrator privileges. The user's password is not important but should be set to a secure value for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: The backend user "_cli_scheduler" is used by the CLI-script to log into TYPO3. This user may not have administrator privileges. The user's password is not important but should be set to a secure value for security reasons.

trans-unit.source: The backend user "_cli_scheduler" exists but is currently disabled.
trans-unit.target: The backend user "_cli_scheduler" exists but is currently disabled.

trans-unit.source: The backend user "_cli_scheduler" was not found. Create the user now.
trans-unit.target: The backend user "_cli_scheduler" was not found. Create the user now.

trans-unit.source: All dates and times in the Scheduler are measured according to the server's time, as the Scheduler is run purely on the server-side.
trans-unit.target: All dates and times in the Scheduler are measured according to the server's time, as the Scheduler is run purely on the server-side.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to mark this task as not running? Note that this will not stop the actual script (if unsure please refer to the manual).
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to mark this task as not running? Note that this will not stop the actual script (if unsure please refer to the manual).

trans-unit.source: The task could not be marked as non-running.
trans-unit.target: The task could not be marked as non-running.

trans-unit.source: The task was successfully marked as non-running.
trans-unit.target: The task was successfully marked as non-running.

trans-unit.source: The requested task (UID: %d) was not found.
trans-unit.target: The requested task (UID: %d) was not found.

trans-unit.source: The task could not be updated.
trans-unit.target: The task could not be updated.

trans-unit.source: The "_cli_scheduler" user already exists. It was not created.
trans-unit.target: The "_cli_scheduler" user already exists. It was not created.

trans-unit.source: The creation of the "_cli_scheduler" user failed.
trans-unit.target: The creation of the "_cli_scheduler" user failed.

trans-unit.source: Disabled, will not be executed, except manually
trans-unit.target: Disabled, will not be executed, except manually

trans-unit.source: Failure! An error occured during the last execution (move over bullet for more details)
trans-unit.target: Failure! An error occured during the last execution (move over bullet for more details)

trans-unit.source: Late, will run with next execution
trans-unit.target: Late, will run with next execution

trans-unit.source: Scheduled, will run on next possible execution
trans-unit.target: Scheduled, will run on next possible execution
